summary: This is a press release from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York announcing the arrest and indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell. It charges her with conspiracy with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors, including enticing and transporting minors, and with perjury related to 2016 depositions. The document outlines the alleged grooming and abuse scheme spanning from 1994 to 1997.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Arrested and charged with conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors, including enticing and transporting minors, and committing perjury in 2016 depositions. Alleged to have played a critical role in grooming and abusing victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased financier alleged to have conspired with Ghislaine Maxwell to sexually abuse minor girls as young as 14 between 1994 and 1997.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.role: Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Issued the press release and made a statement detailing Maxwell's alleged role in facilitating and participating in the sexual abuse of minors.

persons.name: William F. Sweeney Jr.
persons.role: Assistant Director-in-Charge of the New York Field Office of the FBI
persons.context: Made a statement commending the victims for their bravery and detailing the FBI's role in the investigation.

persons.name: Dermot Shea
persons.role: Commissioner of the New York City Police Department (NYPD)
persons.context: Made a statement condemning the alleged crimes and commending investigators.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Assigned to preside over Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

connections.description: Alleged to have conspired together to recruit, groom, transport, and sexually abuse minor girls between 1994 and 1997.
Alleged to have befriended, groomed, and delivered minor victims to Jeffrey Epstein for sexual abuse, and to have participated in abuse herself.
Alleged to have sexually abused minor girls, with the assistance of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Alleged Abuse Conspiracy Period
events.description: The period during which Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein allegedly conspired to recruit, groom, and sexually abuse minor girls as young as 14.

events.title: Maxwell's Sworn Depositions
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell testified under oath in a civil proceeding and is charged with making repeated false statements during these depositions.

events.title: Arrest and Indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested and a federal indictment was unsealed charging her with conspiracy to sexually abuse minors and perjury.

locations: New Hampshire (where Maxwell was to be presented in court)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested and charged with conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors, specifically for acts between 1994 and 1997.
The indictment alleges Maxwell played a critical role in grooming victims as young as 14 by befriending them, taking them on trips, and normalizing sexual interactions with Epstein.
Maxwell is also charged with two counts of perjury for false statements made under oath during 2016 depositions in a civil proceeding.
The alleged abuse occurred at Epstein's residences in New York, Florida, and New Mexico, as well as at Maxwell's residence in London, England.
The document is a press release stating allegations; it emphasizes the defendant is presumed innocent unless proven guilty.
